channel.title: Life Problem
channel.description:
So my mom's friend has a dog and she's selling it. My mom took it for 2 days so she could see if I will take care of it etc. So now I'm giving it back tomorrow and I just love the dog. Well now I'm very depressed and there's now way I'm going to buy the dog. So.. What should I do?
My mom also wanted to make me happy by getting me Turtle Beach's even though I don't feel happy getting it :/

item.title: Life Problem
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

[quote=“Jamie1200, post:25, topic:409815”][quote author=iz3 legend link=topic=511087.msg3709279#msg3709279 date=1313249811]
I have a 8 pound tortoise, hes very loving and carries many diseases.
[/quote]

Yet a turtle carries many diseases that you can’t catch or get infect with yourself :D[/quote]Then the turtle dies and I cry in a corner

Read full topic

Get a turtle, it’ll live on long after you’re dead.
[/quote]I can’t play with it though I used to have fish.
[/quote]Why not? Put it on a leash and pretend it’s a dog.[/quote]:3

item.title: Life Problem
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:17, topic:409815”][quote author=B2300 T4nk link=topic=511087.msg3708692#msg3708692 date=1313200669]
So my mom’s friend has a dog and she’s selling it. My mom took it for 2 days so she could see if I will take care of it etc. So now I’m giving it back tomorrow and I just love the dog. Well now I’m very depressed and there’s now way I’m going to buy the dog. So… What should I do?

My mom also wanted to make me happy by getting me Turtle Beach’s even though I don’t feel happy getting it
[/quote]You sound spoiled. You got a $100 head set and all you can think about is a dog. I’m sorry but I hope when you’re my age you’ll look back on this and realize how ridiculous it sounds lol.

Btw, I don’t understand the question… If you can get the dog and want the dog then get it. If you can’t get it then why are you debating on alternatives with the community?..[/quote]I’m not spoiled. I had to beg for like 2 years to get a dog and like 3 months to get Ps3 and I payed half the money for the PS3.

@OT I got over it and moved on.

Read full topic

item.title: Life Problem
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Andrew Ferguson:

Your complaining that you had a dog for 2 days and are now loosing it and your depressed. I’ve been on every anti depressing known to man and I’m not sitting here complaining that I have a “life problem”. It’s a dog, your not 10 and it didn’t die. Get over it.

How about get the fuck over yourself. This isn’t a one-upmanship about who is more depressed or who has the worst life he’s genuinely sad about losing something that he’s grown close to over the past couple of days. Get your head out of your ass you arrogant prick

Read full topic

item.title: Life Problem
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“B2300 T4nk, post:1, topic:409815”]So my mom’s friend has a dog and she’s selling it. My mom took it for 2 days so she could see if I will take care of it etc. So now I’m giving it back tomorrow and I just love the dog. Well now I’m very depressed and there’s now way I’m going to buy the dog. So… What should I do?

My mom also wanted to make me happy by getting me Turtle Beach’s even though I don’t feel happy getting it :/[/quote]You sound spoiled. You got a $100 head set and all you can think about is a dog. I’m sorry but I hope when you’re my age you’ll look back on this and realize how ridiculous it sounds lol.

Btw, I don’t understand the question… If you can get the dog and want the dog then get it. If you can’t get it then why are you debating on alternatives with the community?..

Read full topic

Your complaining that you had a dog for 2 days and are now loosing it and your depressed. I’ve been on every anti depressing known to man and I’m not sitting here complaining that I have a “life problem”. It’s a dog, your not 10 and it didn’t die. Get over it.

Read full topic

item.title: Life Problem
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

Get a dog in the future. You need to focus on runescape. Prioritize. JK.

For real. Dogs come and go, you will eventually find another one. I had the same connection with a dog but got rid of it but I am happy with my new one.

Read full topic

item.description:
@TheCyberMan wrote:

Get a rabbit. (What? Are rabbits too cool for you guys?)

item.title: Life Problem
item.dc:creator: @Javerfire Javerfire
item.description:
@Javerfire wrote:

Pblord7:

Get over it and move on, or get a cat.

THIS ^ is good advice.
I had a dog, 3 years we had this dog, we had to PAY someone to take him because we were moving. It’s not like the dog is dead.

Read full topic

item.title: Life Problem
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Get a kitten, raise that bitch to a cat and make it cuddle in your lap.
I love my cat <3. First cat came out right, then the second one ran away… </3

Read full topic

item.title: Life Problem
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“B2300 T4nk, post:8, topic:409815”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=511087.msg3708709#msg3708709 date=1313201206]
This is why I love moparscape, Everyone is a social worker.

@OP Ask to keep it, Just make sure you tell her you won’t get bored and you will feed em and stuff like that.
[/quote]I did but I feel that I will get bored someday. Maybe after a year and we won’t be able to sell a adult dog.[/quote]If you’re seriously gonna get bored of a pet in that short of time, You shouldn’t even think about getting one, That’s just stupid.

Read full topic

item.title: Life Problem
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

You don’t get bored with dogs, they’re only fun to play with and you occasionally get annoyed with them.

And pets like dogs end up being a part of your family. You’ll become emotionally attached. If you somehow get bored with the dog, you can’t just sell it. Giving a dog away like its some toy after spending time with a family for a good amount of time will cause terrible effects for the dog. They can feel emotions too you know.

Read full topic

item.title: Life Problem
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

[quote=“B2300 T4nk, post:5, topic:409815”]@PbLord7 That’s what my mom told me and I’m trying to do it.

@Rip4d I have a lot of money so the money problem isn’t in this situation. She thinks that I’ll get bored of the dog.

@Muroth The seller wants to get rid of the dog but my mom said I’ll get bored.[/quote]

The only thing that I could do if I was in your situation is to prove her wrong. Possibly try and make a bet with her, that if you can take care of the dog for a month straight or something similar, she’ll let you keep it. If you lose the bet, you give it away / sell it.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

I hate cats, they’re so mean to me. If you can, convince your mom’s friend to sell it to you, prove to her that you can be responsible for taking care of the dog.

item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Well see if your mom is willing to let you keep it. If you are able to take care of it I don’t see any reason why not to have it (unless you can’t afford it (talking about the dog’s price, not calling you poor ))

Read full topic
